meaningMnemonic: Remember how 自由 means freedom? Well when you add <kanji>not</kanji> it causes you <vocabulary>discomfort</vocabulary> and really <vocabulary>inconveniences</vocabulary> you. That not is in the way of your freedom.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
